itunes:title: gym girl Q&A | mobility, finding balance, becoming a personal trainer + more
title: gym girl Q&A | mobility, finding balance, becoming a personal trainer + more
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
it's a week for mobility, mentally handling missing the gym, pursuing fitness without it consuming your life, how to become a CPT, balancing motherhood or a busy 9-5 schedule, fixing muscle imbalances & so much more as britt answers some of your most asked gym girl questions! we are also celebrating 1 MILLION downloads! thank YOU for listening!


Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Sweat Collection is now live (I wear smalls)

@funandgains.podcast

insta // @_brittanylupton

youtube // Brittany Lupton

tiktok // brittanylupton
